channel.title: Qubes-Whonix TOR-VPN-Socks?
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I´m new to Qubes-Whonix so I want to ask here serveral questions.
1. Is it possible to root the traffic from a Whonix-ws APP VM through TOR -> VPN -> Socks -> World Wide Web?
2. I read about this previously and i guess that a have to create a new proxyVM for each part? For example: A proxyVM for the VPN client, so that i can Root the Whonix-ws APP VM through this ProxyVM?
3. How should the chain look?
Whonix-ws APP VM -> ProxyVM (VPN) -> ProxyVM (Socks) -> Sys-Whonix -> Sys-Firewall -> Sysnet -> World Wide Web?
4. Which Software in the ProxyVM´s do I need?
Thank you very much :slight_smile:

item.title: Qubes-Whonix TOR-VPN-Socks?
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi StuPiD123

Whonix

Tunnels/Introduction

Instructions on how to combine tunnels (VPN, SSH, proxy) with Tor. (User -> Tor -> proxy/VPN/SSH -> Internet) (User -> proxy/VPN/SSH ->...


Whonix

Tunnels/Connecting to Tor before a VPN

Instructions on how to connect to Tor before a VPN (User -> Tor -> VPN -> Internet)

Whonix

Tunnels/Connecting to Tor before a proxy

Instructions on how to connect to Tor before a proxy (User -> Tor -> Proxy -> Internet)

Qubes OS

VPN

How To make a VPN Gateway in Qubes Although setting up a VPN connection is not by itself Qubes specific, Qubes includes a number of tools that can make the client-side setup of your VPN more versatile and secure. This document is a Qubes-specific...

https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorPlusVPN

Read full topic

item.title: Qubes-Whonix TOR-VPN-Socks?

Hey guys,

  1. Is it possible to root the traffic from a Whonix-ws APP VM through TOR -> VPN -> Socks -> World Wide Web?

Whonix-ws APP VM -> ProxyVM (VPN) -> ProxyVM (Socks) -> Sys-Whonix -> Sys-Firewall -> Sysnet -> World Wide Web?
